Seller.name: Seller
Seller.description: Represents the seller role of an individual with respect to a particular company or organization.

ActiveFromDate.description: The date when the seller’s role became active.

ActiveToDate.description: The date when the seller’s role is no longer active.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the account owner associated with this seller.

PartyId.description: Required. Represents the record based on the Individual object you want to associate the seller with.

SalesAmount.description: The total revenue amount gained from this seller.

SellerTier.description: The tier at which this seller is ranked.

SellerType.description: The type of sales this seller specializes in.
